source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_00<tab>The wandering minstrel has a request for an experienced adventurer.

※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ルビーロード国際市場の「異邦の詩人」は、冒険者に頼み事があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_01<tab>Making your way through the Ruby Road Exchange during the Rising, you encounter the wandering minstrel, who asks you to take a fledgling adventurer under your wing. Thus do you make your way to the Gate of Nald, there to await a soul who has just embarked upon the path of adventure.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

異邦の詩人から新人冒険者の案内を頼まれた。ナル大門の「指定地点」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_02<tab>It doesn't take long for an aspiring adventurer to wander through the gate, nor for you to identify him. You approach the bright-eyed lad, who introduces himself as Nhagi'a Jakkya. He gratefully accepts your offer of help, and heads to the Quicksand to register with the Adventurers' Guild, as you yourself once did.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_02<tab>ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤと出会った。クイックサンドで、彼と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_03<tab>With the stroke of a pen and a few words of encouragement from Momodi, Nhagi'a's registration is complete. In view of your experience, the Quicksand proprietress then tasks you with giving the lad the grand tour, beginning with recommending a guild in Ul'dah to join.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者登録を済ませた。クイックサンドの近くで、再度「ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_04<tab>Your sage advice helps Nhagi'a to settle on a guild. Wasting no time, he rushes off to add his name to its roll, but not before requesting to meet again afterwards. When the lad doesn't return after a good while, you decide to look in on him at the guild.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_04<tab>ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤにギルドを勧めた。様子を見るため、彼が赴いた場所へ行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_05<tab>To your relief, you find Nhagi'a more than holding his own. After apologizing for keeping you waiting, he informs you that a peculiar minstrel had approached him with a task, and bade him come to the Ruby Road Exchange to speak further. Curiously, your own presence is also requested, and you make your way to see the client together.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_05<tab>ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤの様子を見た。ルビーロード国際市場にいる「異邦の詩人」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_06<tab>As you had suspected, the client turns out to be the wandering minstrel. The man reveals that, in seeking inspiration for his next composition, he contrived to bring you and Nhagi'a together─an adventurer old and an adventurer new─in a reminder that the present owes its existence to the past. Having thus established his vision, the minstrel then asks each of you to bring him an object with a connection to the Calamity, the event which gave rise to the realm's rebirth. Excited for his first-ever task as an adventurer, Nhagi'a suggests taking your search to the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, where many vendors peddle their wares.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_06<tab>異邦の詩人から、第七霊災にまつわる品の入手を頼まれた。ザル回廊で「ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_07<tab>You join Nhagi'a at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, and together begin looking for your objects.

※You must be accompanied by Nhagi'a Jakkya to complete this task. Speak with him again should you become separated.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_07<tab>ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤを連れてサファイアアベニュー国際市場の店を巡ろう。

※同行状態が解除された場合、再度「ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤ」に話しかけることで同行を再開できます。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_08<tab>You have visited a number of vendors and found promising wares for your purposes. Believing you've seen enough, Nhagi'a suggests heading to a quiet spot to discuss what you will bring to the minstrel.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_08<tab>市場で情報を集めた。連れているナギ・ア・ジャッキヤと、指定地点で話そう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_09<tab>You reveal your selection to Nhagi'a, but he chooses to keep his a surprise. Having then acquired your respective items, you head back to the Ruby Road Exchange, where the wandering minstrel awaits.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_09<tab>第七霊災にまつわる品を手に入れた。ルビーロード国際市場で「異邦の詩人」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_10<tab>You present your acquisition to the minstrel, who declares its suitability for his composition before turning his attention to Nhagi'a. The lad reveals his object to be the scrapbook of articles taken from <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>, the Gridanian tabloid where his sister works as a reporter. During the Calamity, said sister traveled the realm, interviewing adventurers about their journeys, and her tales instilled in him the desire to see the world. Your combined contributions serve to inspire the minstrel, who conceives of a verse and proceeds to perform it. No sooner does he strum the first chord than you are transported to a place beyond time and space, where you meet with the mysterious Naoki Yoshida. The man thanks you for continuing to grace the realm with your presence, and hints that change is coming. Yet come what may, he hopes that your journey together shall ever continue.

Returning to reality, you bid Nhagi'a well as he sets off on his own. And after the young adventurer has disappeared from sight, the minstrel performs for you another song─one of futures unknown and journeys unending. Hardships may await upon the road ahead, and there may be times when you feel defeated. But so long as you harbor love for this world, ever shall there be a place for you in it.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEQ_10<tab>異邦の詩人と話した。新たな旅路を歩む人々への祝福を詠った彼とともに、冒険者は新生祭の花火を見つめるのだった。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab>Greetings, friend. By your dauntless bearing, I assume you are an adventurer.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab>やあ、君は冒険者だね？
その目を見れば、いい旅を続けているのだとわかるよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>As for myself, I am a humble wandering minstrel. One who draws inspiration from the daring deeds of those in your calling.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>おっと失礼……
僕は、冒険者の活躍を詩にしている者でね。
異邦の詩人なんて呼ばれている。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_003<tab>Ah, if it isn't my dear adventurer friend! Pleased am I to see you again. Have you perchance come to join us in remembering the Calamity?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_003<tab>やあ、君は……！
嬉しいね、まさかここで会えるなんて。
君も新生祭を見に来たのかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_004<tab>If you have a moment, there is a favor I would ask of you. Will you not hear me out?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_004<tab>ふむ……ちょうどいい。
もしよければ、冒険者としての君に、
頼みごとをしたいのだけど……どうだろう？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_005<tab>Of late, more people are seeking to take up adventuring.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_005<tab>実は昨今、冒険者を志望する人が増えてきていてね。
もちろんそれはとても喜ばしいんだが……

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_006<tab>In part due to the promotional efforts during the recent Moonfire Faire, more people are seeking to take up adventuring.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_006<tab>実は昨今、紅蓮祭での広報活動の甲斐もあって、
冒険者を志す人が急速に増えてきていてね。
もちろん、それはとても喜ばしいんだが……

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_007<tab>Not all are yet wise in the ways of the world, however, and I fear they might fall prey to less-principled types in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_007<tab>ウルダハは生き馬の目を抜く商人の街だから、
何もわからない新人冒険者が面倒事に巻き込まれないか、
少し心配なんだよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_008<tab>If one such as you were to help them on their way, I would feel more at ease. What say you? Will you not take a fledgling adventurer under your wing?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_008<tab>そこで、信頼できる冒険者に、
案内役を頼んでみようと思い立ったのさ。
君なら安心なんだが……引き受けてくれないかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_009<tab>I'm truly grateful!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_009<tab>ありがとう、助かるよ！
……おっと、そうこうしているうちに、
チョコボキャリッジが着く頃合いだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_010<tab>Now, I believe a carriage is due to arrive shortly. If you go and wait at the Gate of Nald, chances are a soul will wander in who has just embarked upon the path of adventure. Pray greet them and offer your help.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_010<tab>君はナル大門で待機して、
冒険者志望の若者が通ったら、声をかけてあげてほしい。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011<tab>Worry not, you'll have no trouble identifying them. You need but look for someone absorbed in their surroundings.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011<tab>うまく見つけられるか心配かもしれないが、大丈夫。
初めて都市を訪れる若者というのは、
たいてい周囲を見渡すものだから、きっとすぐにわかるさ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_012<tab>Hehe, I daresay it will feel like glimpsing into the past─right to the part where you are greeted by a helpful stranger.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_012<tab>ふふ……君もそうして、
声をかけられた経験があるんじゃないかな？
……それじゃあ、よろしく頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q1_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A1_000_001<tab>Oi, adventurer! Over here!
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A1_000_001<tab>よう！　そこの冒険者！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A1_000_002<tab>Is this your first trip to Ul'dah?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A1_000_002<tab>ウルダハは初めてかい？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A1_000_003<tab>Welcome to Ul'dah!
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A1_000_003<tab>ようこそ、ウルダハへ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_020<tab>(-Bright-eyed Youth-)Wh-Who are you?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_020<tab>(-冒険者を志す若者-)びっくりした……！
ええと、あんたは？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_021<tab>(-Bright-eyed Youth-)An experienced adventurer, you say? And you want to help me on my way?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_021<tab>(-冒険者を志す若者-)先輩冒険者の、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>？
案内してくれるのか？　ホントに？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_022<tab>(-Bright-eyed Youth-)Well, I could certainly use some guidance. I've never been anywhere near as big and busy as Ul'dah...
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_022<tab>(-冒険者を志す若者-)それ、助かるよ……なんせ俺、こんな大都市は初めてでさ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_023<tab>My name is Nhagi'a Jakkya, but just “Nhagi” will do. And as you rightly guessed, I'm an aspiring adventurer. That's why I left my village and came here.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_023<tab>俺の名前は、ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤ！
冒険者になりたくて、辺境から出てきたんだ。
「ナギ」って呼んでほしい……よろしくな！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_024<tab>So...I understand that you first need to register at the Adventurers' Guild. Do you know where it is?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_024<tab>それで、ええと……冒険者になるには、
ギルドで登録する必要があるって聞いたんだけど……
どこでやるか、知ってる？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_025<tab>Just through that door, is it? Thank you, I'll head there at once!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_025<tab>すぐそこか！
ありがとう、行ってみるよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Nhagi rushes off before you can offer further explanation. Perhaps you should follow him to the Quicksand.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>ナギは、詳しい説明をする前に行ってしまった。
「クイックサンド」に行って、彼の様子を見てみよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_026<tab>
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_026<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_030<tab>In...and out... In...and out... Come on, Nhagi, you can do it...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_030<tab>すー……はー……落ち着け、
冒険者として、最初の一歩だ……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_031<tab>Oh, it's you again... To be honest, I'm quite nervous. It's heartening to have you here too.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_031<tab>あ、さっきの……
もしかして、心配で来てくれたのかい？
正直ちょっと緊張してたから……横に居てくれると嬉しいよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_032<tab>Why, hello there. What can I do for you today?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_032<tab>あら、いらっしゃい。
今日はどうしたの？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_033<tab>The lad's here to register, is he?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_033<tab>もしかしてその子、
冒険者登録に来てくれたのかしら？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_034<tab>Yes, madam, I wish to join the Adventurers' Guild! My name is Nhagi'a Jakkya, and I'm sixteen years old─practically a man grown!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_034<tab>ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤ、16歳！
ぜひ、ギルドへの登録をお願いしますッ……！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_035<tab>Hehe, aren't we a lively one? Momodi's the name, and if you want to be an adventurer, then you've come to the right woman.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_035<tab>あら、元気がいいこと！
わたしはモモディ、冒険者ギルドの窓口もある、
ここ「クイックサンド」の女将よ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_036<tab>There's nothing to it, really─you just need to write your name in the register. Come, come...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_036<tab>それじゃさっそく、書類にサインをしてくれる？
あなたにお仕事を頼む時も、お墓をつくる時も、
名前の綴りがわからないと困るもの。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_037<tab>With that, you're officially a member of the Adventurers' Guild. If you ever need a bit of advice about one thing or another, pay me a visit. Just don't go botherin' me every time you stub your bloody toe, all right?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_037<tab>よし、これであなたは冒険者ギルドの一員！
がんばってね、何かあれば、いつでも相談に乗るわよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_038<tab>'Course, I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> enjoy hearin' tell of a gentleman's woes with the womenfolk from time to time...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_038<tab>……でも、人生相談はお断り。
恋愛相談なら考えてあげてもいいわ。
ウフフ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_039<tab>Now then, normally I'd offer you the grand tour...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_039<tab>さて、いつもなら、
わたしが案内してあげるのだけど……

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_040<tab>But in light of present company, I reckon you ought to have it from <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_040<tab>そうねえ、めったにない機会でもあるし……。
ナギ君、あなた、<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>と少しお話ししてみたら？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_041<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s your senior in adventurin', after all, and you could do worse than to get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> advice.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_041<tab>なにせ<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>は、
冒険者としての「先輩」だもの！
その助言は、聞いておいて損はないはずよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_100_041<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s a renowned adventurer, after all─the bleedin' champion of Eorzea─and you could do far worse than to get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> advice.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_100_041<tab>なにせ<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>は、
世界各地で活躍する先輩冒険者だもの！
その助言は、聞いておいて損はないはずよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_042<tab>To begin with, mayhap you could recommend a guild here in Ul'dah for Nhagi to join?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_042<tab>ふふふ、あなたはナギ君の話を聞いて、
彼に合うウルダハのギルドを勧めてあげてくれるかしら？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_043<tab>If it's too noisy in here, there are benches just outside where you can have a nice little chat.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_043<tab>店内だと落ち着かないでしょうし、
西側出口のベンチを使ってくれて構わないわ。
準備ができたら、あなたから声をかけてあげてね。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_044<tab>With your experience, I reckon you could give Nhagi some sound advice on a guild to join. Go on, have a little chat and see what might suit him.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_044<tab>ふふふ、あなたはナギ君の話を聞いて、
彼に合うウルダハのギルドを勧めてあげてくれるかしら？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_050<tab>I must confess, choosing a guild is quite daunting... I'd appreciate any advice you can offer.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_050<tab>ちょっと緊張するけど……
俺のほうは、いつでも大丈夫だよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>The following event cannot be skipped. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>このイベントはスキップすることができないため、
コンテンツファインダー申請中の場合などは、ご注意ください。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A2_000_001<tab>All right, let's talk guilds.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A2_000_001<tab>それじゃ……隣、いいかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A2_000_002<tab>Give me just a moment.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A2_000_002<tab>ごめん、もうちょっと待ってて

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_052<tab>I'm all ears, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_052<tab>あらためて……
よろしく、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A3_000_001<tab>Adventuring can be dangerous. What attracted you to it?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A3_000_001<tab>何だって、冒険者なんて危ない生業に？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A3_000_002<tab>Why did you want to become an adventurer?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A3_000_002<tab>どうして冒険者になろうと思った？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_053<tab>A merchant who was in the carriage with me─a Bre...something─asked me much the same thing.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_053<tab>あ……それ、チョコボキャリッジに乗ってた、
商人のおっさんにも聞かれたよ。
たしかブレモン……なんとかさん。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_054<tab>At the time, I couldn't give a proper answer. I had a reason for leaving home, of course, but I couldn't express it in words.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_054<tab>そのとき俺、うまく答えられなかったんだ。
故郷を出たいって想いは、確かにあったけど……
うまく言葉にできなくて。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_055<tab>But having now set foot in Ul'dah, it's become clear in my mind.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_055<tab>でも、ウルダハの街並みを見て、わかった気がした。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_056<tab>I wanted to know what lay beyond the horizon. Wanted to see it with my own eyes and be amidst it.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_056<tab>きっと俺、知ってみたかったんだ。
見える景色の先に何があるか、
それがどんなものなのか……自分自身で触れて、さ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_057<tab>You've been to many places, right? You like it, then? Traveling, that is...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_057<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
いろんな場所を旅してきたんだろう？
やっぱり、旅っていいものだと思うかい？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q4_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A4_000_001<tab>I love traveling. There's nothing like the thrill of seeing new sights.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A4_000_001<tab>旅は好きだし、まだ見ぬ土地を思うと心が躍る

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A4_000_002<tab>Traveling is nice, but I'd prefer to put my roots down somewhere.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A4_000_002<tab>できれば一カ所に滞在したい……

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_058<tab>So you do, so you do...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_058<tab>やっぱり！
冒険者になるヤツって、みんなそうなのかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_059<tab>I have an older sister. During the Calamity, we fled Gridania and took refuge in a village in the mountains.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_059<tab>……俺、歳の離れた姉貴がいてさ。
第七霊災の時に、姉貴に連れられてグリダニアを出て、
山間の小さな村に避難したんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_060<tab>I ended up staying in that secluded place, and it's long been a dream of mine to travel the world.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_060<tab>そこは、世界情勢から切り離されたような田舎で……
ずっと村の外へ、旅に出ることを夢見てたんだよな。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_061<tab>Truly? That's a little unexpected...
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_061<tab>そうなんだ、ちょっと意外かも。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_062<tab>And yet...perhaps it's when we've seen the world that we know there's a perfect place for us. One we'd like to call home.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_062<tab>あ、でも……旅をしてきたからこそ、
ずっといたいと思えるような場所があるって、
知ることができたのかもな！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_063<tab>But inexperienced as I am, I don't know if I could live a life on the road. Is there a guild that could equip me with the skills I need?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_063<tab>ただ、旅を日常とするには、俺には力が足りない。
だから……そのために役立つ場所があるなら、
紹介してくれないかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q6_000_000<tab>What guild will you recommend?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q6_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A6_000_001<tab>One representing students of the fighting arts.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A6_000_001<tab>ファイターやソーサラーのギルドを勧める

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A6_000_002<tab>One representing crafters and gatherers.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A6_000_002<tab>ギャザラーやクラフターのギルドを勧める

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_064<tab>I see, a place where I can learn how to protect myself and others... If I recall correctly, Ul'dah is home to the Pugilists' and Thaumaturges' Guilds.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_064<tab>なるほど、戦闘術を学べる場所か。
ウルダハにあるのは格闘士に剣術士……
それから呪術士のギルドだっけ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_065<tab>Of those two, I'd choose the pugilists. I've always enjoyed rigorous exercise, and am quite confident in my physical abilities. Yes, I believe this is the guild for me! I'll go and join at once!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_065<tab>それなら俺、格闘士ギルドを選ぶよ！
昔から体を動かすのが好きで、身のこなしにも自信があるんだ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_066<tab>I see, a place where I can learn a trade... Indeed, we can't always rely on fighting to make a living, and having the ability to gather or craft would be invaluable.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_066<tab>物を集めて作って売って……それを生業とする者のギルドか。
戦えないときでも食えるよう、生活力を磨けってこと？
なるほど……さっすが先輩！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_067<tab>If I recall correctly, Ul'dah is home to the Alchemists' Guild. I happen to have some familiarity with medicinal herbs, and I daresay I can put the knowledge to use. Yes, I believe this is the guild for me! I'll go and join at once!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_067<tab>たしかウルダハって、錬金術師ギルドがあるよな？
これでも生まれは黒衣森でさ、薬草の類には詳しいんだ。
その知識が活きるかも……！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q7_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A7_000_001<tab>Will you be all right by yourself?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A7_000_001<tab>ひとりで平気？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A7_000_002<tab>I can show you to the guild if you like.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A7_000_002<tab>ついていこうか？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_068<tab>Thanks for your concern, but I should be fine.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_068<tab>大丈夫、頼りきりじゃ冒険者なんて名乗れないさ。
街を探索しつつ、ひとりで向かうよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_069<tab>If you still have time, though, could we meet again afterwards? There are a few more things I'd like to ask you about.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_069<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>と話せて、楽しかった！
ギルドに入ったら戻ってくるから、
よければ、またあとで会えないかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_100_069<tab>Great! I'll look for you here when I'm done!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_100_069<tab>へへへ、ありがとう。
……それじゃ、行ってくるよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You wait a good while, but there is no sign of Nhagi. Perhaps you should look in on him at the Pugilists' Guild.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>のんびり時間を過ごしたが、
ナギはまだ戻らないようだ。
格闘士ギルドへ、様子を見に行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>You wait a good while, but Nhagi is nowhere to be seen. Perhaps you should look in on him at the Alchemists' Guild.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>のんびり時間を過ごしたが、
ナギはまだ戻らないようだ。
錬金術師ギルドへ、様子を見に行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_072<tab>Judgin' by how at ease the lad looks around you, I reckon you've got a knack for guidance. Mayhap you'd care to do my job for me? Hehehe...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_MOMODI_000_072<tab>遠目から見ていたけれど、あの子、楽しそうだったわね。
あなた相談役に向いているんじゃない？
うふふ……わたしの仕事、代わってみる？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_080<tab>That was a most impressive display, young one! Watching you, I'm reminded of myself in my youth─swift, strong, and handsome. Not to say that I'm not these things anymore, of course...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_080<tab>フォッフォッフォ……ナギよ、素晴らしい連撃じゃったぞ！
お主を見ておると、昔のワシを思い出すようじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_081<tab>You're too kind, Master Hamon! And I'm sure you're still all those things and more!
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_081<tab>ありがとうございます、ハモン師匠！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_CHUCHUTO_000_082<tab>Now, now, Nhagi, take care you don't flatter the old man overmuch. His neck couldn't bear his head getting any larger.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_CHUCHUTO_000_082<tab>師匠、新しい弟子ができてよかったわね！
……でもナギ、あんまりこの人をおだてすぎちゃダメよ？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_083<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm glad to say that pugilism agrees with me. My thanks for your recommendation!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_083<tab>あ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
格闘士、俺に合ってたみたいだ。
勧めてくれてありがとう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_084<tab>Well now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, to think that you're the one who sent Nhagi to us! The lad possesses rare talent, and I look forward to watching him grow in our art.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_084<tab>おお、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
お主がナギを紹介してくれたのか！
なかなかに筋がよくて、先が楽しみじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_085<tab>So you're the one who sent Nhagi to us! The lad possesses rare talent, and I look forward to watching him grow in our art.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_085<tab>おお、お主がナギを紹介してくれたのか。
なかなかに筋がよくて、先が楽しみじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_086<tab>Right then, my boy. Remember today's lesson well, and keep at your training. Next time, we shall try something a little harder!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_086<tab>では、ナギよ……
先ほどの教えを胸に刻み、鍛錬を続けるのだぞ！
一回り成長したとき、次の修行に臨むからのう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_087<tab>I'm sorry for keeping you waiting. So engrossed was I in the combinations, I lost track of time...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_087<tab>待たせちゃったみたいで、ごめん。
教えられるがままに連撃を繰り返してたら、
夢中になっちゃって……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_088<tab>Oh, I should mention something. As I was training, a peculiar minstrel approached me. He said that, if I'm resolved to walk an adventurer's path, I should seek him out for a task.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_088<tab>そうだ、修行中に怪しげな詩人に声をかけられたんだ。
冒険者として歩み出す決意が固まったら、
最初の依頼をしたいから来てくれ、だって。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_089<tab>Moreover, he asked that you accompany me. If you're willing, he's apparently waiting at the Ruby Road Exchange.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_089<tab>ぜひ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も一緒にって、
言われたんだけど……よかったら行ってみないか？
「ルビーロード国際市場」で待ってるらしいよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_090<tab>Always a pleasure to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Come and shed some sweat with us again soon, do you hear?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_000_090<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、
今後もちょくちょく顔を出すのじゃぞ。
チュチュトが寂しがるからのう……！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_100_090<tab>Hm? If you want to shed some sweat too, then you're more than welcome.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_HAMON_100_090<tab>お主も修行していくかの？
ワシは構わんぞい。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_091<tab>Idiot! Had my mental faculties been diminished as a result, what then!? The world would have forever been deprived of my genius, that's what!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_091<tab>新入りめ……！
錬金術師の叡智たる私の頭脳に、
悪影響が出たらどうする！！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_092<tab>Ah, my loyal assistant, you are come at a good time! This fool of a trainee switched my drinking water with some unknown fluid...which I unwittingly imbibed!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_092<tab>おぉ、我が助手っ！
聞いてくれ……この新入り、私の飲料水をすり替えて、
得体の知れない液体を飲ませたのだ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_093<tab>Who are you supposed to be? This trainee's keeper? Well then, you should know that the fool switched my drinking water with some unknown fluid...which I unwittingly imbibed!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_093<tab>なんだお前は……新入りの保護者か？
ならば聞け、こいつ、私の飲料水をすり替えて、
得体の知れない液体を飲ませたのだ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_094<tab>I-I'm sorry, Master Severian, but it was just a herbal tea. Y-You looked weary, and I thought that it might help...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_094<tab>す、すみませんっ！
あれは薬草を煎じた薬茶で……。
その、お疲れのように見えたから……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_095<tab>Why in the seven hells didn't you say so first!? That way I might have recorded my vital signs and ascertained the tea's effects!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_095<tab>なぜ、それを先に言わん！
服用の前後で、体温、血圧、その他諸々の記録をつけねば、
効能や副作用の有無を検証できないではないか！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_096<tab>Such negligence ill befits an alchemist, and I ought to kick you out of my laboratory right now!
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_096<tab>お前の行いは、言語道断だ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_097<tab>Still...you completed the assigned tasks perfectly. In light of this, you have earned another chance. Very well, you may serve as my assistant─on a probationary basis.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_097<tab>しかし……出した課題の方は、完璧にこなしていたな。
ならば仕方ない、入門だけは認めてやる。
小間使いとして使い倒してやろう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_098<tab>...Ahem. I'm sorry you had to see that, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. But it seems all is well...at least for now.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_098<tab>さ、さすがは錬金術師って感じだな。
あの薬茶かなり苦いはずなのに、味に触れず、
成分や効能のことばかり考えてた……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_099<tab>Master Severian truly lives and breathes alchemy. Though the tea is quite bitter, he thought only of its effects and made no comment on its taste. I believe I stand to learn much under him, and I'll do my best not to incur his ire.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_099<tab>あの人の下で修行すれば、いろんなことが学べそうだ！
入門を許されたし、これからも錬金術を続けてみるよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_100<tab>I must also apologize to you for keeping you waiting. So engrossed was I in the potion making, I lost track of time...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_100<tab>それから……待たせちゃったみたいで、ごめん。
調合が楽しくて、時間を忘れてた……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_101<tab>Oh, and one other thing. As I was at my work, a peculiar minstrel approached me. He said that, if I'm resolved to walk an adventurer's path, I should seek him out for a task.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_101<tab>そうだ、調合中に怪しげな詩人に声をかけられたんだ。
冒険者として歩み出す決意が固まったら、
最初の依頼をしたいから来てくれ、だって。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_102<tab>Moreover, he asked that you accompany me. If you're willing, he's apparently waiting at the Ruby Road Exchange.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_102<tab>ぜひ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も一緒にって、
言われたんだけど……よかったら行ってみないか？
「ルビーロード国際市場」で待ってるらしいよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_103<tab>Hm, my body feels marginally warmer... It would seem the tea has the effect of promoting circulation...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SEVERIAN_000_103<tab>心なしか体温が上昇している……？
血行を促進する効能があるということか……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_110<tab>Here he is, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the minstrel.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_110<tab>さっき会ったのは、この人で間違いないよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_111<tab>My friend, you have done a splendid job as a guide. I was right to entrust the task to you.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_111<tab>やあ、見事に案内役を務めてくれたようだね。
君に頼んで、本当によかった。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_112<tab>What? Do you mean to say <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> approached me at your behest?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_112<tab>えっ……！？
てことは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が声を掛けてくれたのは、
この人から頼まれたからだったのか！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_113<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> did, I must confess. You see, for my next composition, I seek to capture the essence of the times. While any number of subjects would be worthwhile, of greatest interest to me is the recent rise in the ranks of adventurers.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_113<tab>ああ、実は今「エオルゼアの現在」をテーマに詩を考えているんだ。
そこで、増え続ける冒険者たちに注目していたんだが……
ふと先輩冒険者との出会いをプロデュースしたくなってね。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_114<tab>In thus bringing different generations of adventurers together, I had hoped for inspiration to strike...and I'm pleased to say that it has!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_114<tab>そうして、君たちの姿を見守らせてもらっていたら、
詩作のヒントが得られたんだよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_115<tab>Drawing upon your experience walking your path, you have helped Nhagi to begin walking his─a reminder that the present owes its existence to the past.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_115<tab>先輩冒険者である君は、
過去の経験を通じて、新人のナギ君を導いていた。
当たり前だが、現在は過去の先に存在していたのさ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_116<tab>That is to say, the present and the past are deeply entwined. If we would capture the former, we cannot well disregard the latter. And this brings me to my next request...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_116<tab>つまりそれは、「エオルゼアの現在」を詩に切り取るなら、
過去についても再認識しておく必要があることを意味する。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_117<tab>I ask that you each find an object with a connection to the Calamity─the event which gave rise to the realm's rebirth─and present it to me with its tale.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_117<tab>そこで、君たちに依頼したい。
エオルゼア新生の発端である第七霊災ゆかりの品を探し、
その品に秘められた物語とともに持ち帰ってほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_118<tab>Well now, that sounds not unlike a treasure hunt...and it'd be my very first task as an adventurer! What do you say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Shall we do it?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_118<tab>初めての依頼……宝探しみたいだ！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、やってみたいんだけど、
どうかな……！？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_119<tab>Excellent. When you have your items, pray seek me out at the Ruby Road Exchange. I eagerly look forward to seeing what you bring.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_119<tab>ありがとう、各自ひとつずつ見つけたら、
ルビーロード国際市場の奥に来てほしい。
君たちが何を選ぶか、楽しみにしているよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_120<tab>There are many vendors at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, right? Chances are they'll have something, so let's begin our search there!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_120<tab>それじゃ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
準備ができたら「サファイアアベニュー国際市場」で合流しよう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_121<tab>Come on, let's begin looking around!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_121<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、来たな！
さっそく、一緒に見て回ろう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_122<tab>Nhagi'a Jakkya is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_122<tab>ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤが「同行」を開始します。
クエストを進行させるには、同行者が近くにいる状態で、
目的を達成する必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>You can leave Nhagi'a Jakkya behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>「同行」は、エリアを移動した場合や、
「同行状態を解除する」を選んだ場合に解除されます。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_124<tab>If you wish to have Nhagi'a Jakkya accompany you again, return and speak with him at the original location.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_124<tab>解除した場合、もとの場所に戻った同行者に話しかけることで、
再び「同行」させることができます。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_124<tab>While you are accompanied, you may encounter “conversation points” along the way which offer additional topics of discussion.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_124<tab>また、同行者がいるときは、
目的地までの経路付近に、特殊な会話を聞くことができる、
「トークスポット」が存在する場合があります。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_200_124<tab>Enter the glowing area and speak with your quest companions to initiate these bonus conversations. Enjoy exploring your surroundings together!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_200_124<tab>「トークスポット」に入った状態で同行者に話しかけると、
関連する話題が追加されています。
仲間との寄り道を楽しみましょう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q50_000_050<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q50_000_050<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_051<tab>Talk.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_051<tab>話す

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_052<tab>Part ways.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_052<tab>同行状態を解除する

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_053<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_053<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_125<tab>An object with a connection to the Calamity... I wonder what manner of things we'll find!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_125<tab>第七霊災にまつわる品物か……
宝探しみたいで、わくわくするよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q52_000_126<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Nhagi'a Jakkya?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q52_000_126<tab>同行状態を解除します。本当によろしいですか？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_127<tab>Oh, you need to be somewhere? All right, I'll wait for you in the area.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_127<tab>あ、別の用事？
じゃあ俺、さっきの場所で待ってるよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_128<tab>Ready to continue? Then let's go!
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_128<tab>おかえり！　じゃ、行こう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_129<tab>Nhagi'a Jakkya has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_129<tab>同行者がまだ到着していない。
近くまで迎えにいって、ともに話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_129<tab>You must be accompanied by Nhagi'a Jakkya and have him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_129<tab>このクエストを進行させるには、
ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤが同行している状態で、
さらに、プレイヤーの近くにいる必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_054<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the local cuisine.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_054<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>「料理屋カテリーヌ」について話す<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_055<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the House of Splendors.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A50_000_055<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>「スクリップ取引窓口」について話す<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_130<tab>Shall we look around some more? There's bound to be other things out there.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_130<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、どうせなら、
ひととおり回ってから決めないか？
他にも面白そうな品物が見つかるかも！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_131<tab>So far, so good. Let's look around just a little more.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_131<tab>品物の情報、順調に集まってるな。
もうちょっと見てみよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_132<tab>...I daresay we've seen enough. Let's find a quiet spot to discuss what to bring back.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_132<tab>……いくつか見つけたし、
そろそろ、どれを買っていくか決めないか？
ここだとちょっと落ち着かないから、市場の端で話そう！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_133<tab>You have seen enough objects and learned the stories behind them. Make your way to the end of the Sapphire Avenue Exchange with Nhagi'a and speak with him.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_000_133<tab>第七霊災にまつわる品物の情報を入手しました！
サファイアアベニュー国際市場の端にある指定地点まで移動し、
同行者の「ナギ・ア・ジャッキヤ」に話しかけてみましょう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_140<tab>Welcome, welcome! What is it that you're after?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_140<tab>いらっしゃいませ、何かお探しですか？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_141<tab>Objects with a connection to the Calamity, you say? Why, I have just the thing─an amethyst ring from Ishgard, steeped in sentimental value!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_141<tab>第七霊災にまつわる、曰く付きの品……。
でしたら、こちらはいかがでしょう？
イシュガルド由来の、アメジストの指輪です。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_142<tab>Five years ago, on the eve of the Battle of Carteneau, a young Temple Knight set out from his homeland, wishing to do his part for Eorzea when his nation would not.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_142<tab>5年前、カルテノーの戦いの折……
援軍派兵を拒否した祖国イシュガルドの方針に異を唱え、
義心のままに駆け出した、若き神殿騎士たちがいたそうです。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_143<tab>Alas, the man never arrived in the Flats.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_143<tab>しかし、彼らはカルテノーにたどり着けなかった。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_144<tab>En route, he came upon a merchant being attacked by a dragon...and lost his life going to the stranger's aid. This was his ring─an heirloom passed down through his line.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_144<tab>道中、竜に襲われる商人を目撃し、
助けようと戦いを挑み、命を散らせたとか……。
この指輪は、ある騎士の家に伝わる由緒ある品のようです。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_145<tab>What a tragic tale... But I wonder─how did the ring find its way back? If the knight fell, it seems the merchant couldn't have survived unscathed...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_145<tab>そんなできごとが……。
でもそれ、騎士が全員死んだなら商人も無事じゃないよな？
誰が指輪を持ち帰ったんだろう？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_146<tab>Um...er... A-Ah, I remember now! Though the knight was mortally wounded, he succeeded in striking down the dragon. And with his last breath, he entrusted the ring to the merchant. Y-Yes, that's how it happened!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_146<tab>あー……えーと、そ、そうだ思い出しました！
若き騎士は竜と相打ちになったのです！
商人に家宝の指輪を渡して、息絶えた……そうに違いありません！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_147<tab>So, what do you say? If you're interested, I would be willing to part with the relic for a special price─but for today only!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_LOLONU_000_147<tab>さあ、いかがでしょう？
今なら割引価格でご提供しますよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_148<tab>Hmmm, this feels a bit dubious...
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_148<tab>う～ん、ちょっと怪しいけど……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_149<tab>Greetings and welcome to my exhibit. Please feel free to browse at your leisure.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_149<tab>やあ、<var 08 E905 ((お姉さん)) ((お兄さん)) /var>！
今日はどうしたんだい？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_150<tab>Oh, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How have you been, my friend?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_150<tab>やあ、<var 08 E905 ((お姉さん)) ((お兄さん)) /var>！
いつぞやは、ガラス絵を修復してくれてありがとう。
俺、あれからも作品を作り続けてるよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_151<tab>I'm still working at my craft, as you can see. And for the Rising this year, Astin has organized this street exhibit for me. Please feel free to browse at your leisure, and don't hesitate to let me know if you have any questions.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_151<tab>この新生祭の期間中は、アスティンの計らいで、
路上で小さな個展を開かせてもらってるんだ。
ところで、今日はどうしたんだい？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_152<tab>Greetings and welcome to my exhibit. Please feel free to browse at your leisure, and don't hesitate to let me know if you have any questions.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_152<tab>足を止めてくれてありがとう。
何か、気になる品はあったかい？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_153<tab>We're looking for objects that bear a connection to the Calamity. Do you have anything that fits the description?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_153<tab>実は、今に繋がる過去を知るために、
第七霊災ゆかりの品物を探してるんだ。
そういう作品、ないかな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_154<tab>As a matter of fact, I do! Yonder pane, entitled <var 1A 02 /var>The Sultana's Seven<var 1A 01 /var>, depicts an inspiring event from the Calamity!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_154<tab>ちょうどいいのがあるよ……！
第七霊災の出来事をモチーフにしたガラス絵さ！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_155<tab>'Twas the final days before the fall of Dalamud, its inexorable approach foretelling our impending doom. Panic spread like wildfire, while many in their desperation turned on the sultanate. Looting and rioting broke out across Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_155<tab>第七霊災の折、ウルダハでは、
衛星「ダラガブ」が頭上に迫ったことで、
不安にかられた市民が暴徒と化したんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_156<tab>To quell the masses, Her Royal Majesty Nanamo Ul Namo took to the streets with a guard consisting of only seven subjects, for they alone had the courage to stand with their sultana. There, she addressed the rabble.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_156<tab>そんなパニックを鎮めたのが、ナナモ様さ。
たった7人の護衛を伴い、混乱の渦中にある人々に語りかけた。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_157<tab>"Heed me, my beloved citizens! The realm lies upon the brink of the Seventh Umbral Era. Yet so long as we live, we must not forget our compassion. Now is not the time to take from your neighbor, but to proffer him the hand of succor.“
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_157<tab>『倒れた者の財を奪うのではなく、
　助け起こして共に財を築くことを考えよ！』ってね。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_158<tab>Brought to their senses by her words, the people laid down their arms and set about healing the wounds they themselves had inflicted on Ul'dah. And those who returned from the battlefield found their home much as they had left it: a gleaming jewel in the desert.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_158<tab>そんな演説があったからこそ、今のウルダハの賑わいがある。
これは、そんなエピソードを描いた絵なんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_159<tab>Her Grace sounds like a great ruler.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_159<tab>ナナモ様って……この国の、女王様だよな？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_160<tab>Ul'dah is fortunate to have her watching over it.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_160<tab>そっか……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
俺、なんだかこの国のこと好きになれそうだよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_161<tab>Thanks for sharing the tale. It's indeed inspiring, and you've done an incredible job capturing it in glass!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_161<tab>説明してくれて、ありがとう！
そんな情景をガラス細工で描けるなんて、
あんた、すごい彫金師なんだな！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_162<tab>Having an exhibit all to myself, I can't help but feel a bit self-conscious.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_162<tab>路上を借りた小さなものとはいえ、
「個展」となると、緊張するな。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_163<tab>But at the same time, I feel great satisfaction. And it encourages me to keep at my craft.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV07GOLDSMITH_000_163<tab>けれど……こうして足を止めて作品を見てもらえると、
やっぱり幸せを感じるもんだ。
「また作ろう」って、そう思えるよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_170<tab>Greetings! From daily necessities to unusual curios, I deal in all manner of wares. If there is something in particular you seek, you need but ask.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_170<tab>いらっしゃい。
生活用品に雑誌、質流れの珍品まで、
いろいろ扱ってますよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_171<tab>Hmmm, objects to do with the Calamity... The two of you are adventurers, are you not? In which case, I have something that may be of interest.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_171<tab>第七霊災にまつわる品……。
見たところ、あなた方は冒険者ですね？
なら、このようなものはいかがでしょう。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_172<tab>It's a journal I acquired from an adventurer who retired injured. The man recorded his experiences during the Calamity in detail, and I daresay it has value for students of history.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_172<tab>怪我で引退した冒険者から買い上げた、紀行録です。
霊災当時の様子が細かく記してありまして、
史料としても価値が高いかと……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_173<tab>Oho, an adventurer's firsthand account! I'd love to pore over it!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_173<tab>当時の冒険者の記録！
すごいなそれ、俺も読んでみたいよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_174<tab>Do you keep a journal of your adventures as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? If so, I'd love to read it too one day. With your permission, of course...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_174<tab>旅の記録をつける冒険者は多いって聞いたけど、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も書いてるのか？
もしそうなら……いつか読んでみたいな、あんたの旅の話。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_175<tab>Oh, for another historical piece, I also have a scrapbook of articles from <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>, Gridania's leading tabloid. These mainly cover events outside the Calamity, however...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NANABE_000_175<tab>あとは、『週刊レイヴン』の記事を集めた、
スクラップブックなんかもありますが……
第七霊災のエピソードとは、少し違いますね。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_176<tab>Articles from <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>, you say? Hmmm...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_176<tab>『週刊レイヴン』？
それって、グリダニアのゴシップ誌の？
なるほど……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_177<tab>Ooh, is this the local cuisine? Goodness, but everything looks amazing!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_177<tab>あっ、うまそう！
ザナラーンの郷土料理かな……？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_178<tab>In the course of your journeys, you must have sampled all kinds of food. From simple fare to exotic feasts, I look forward to sampling everything too!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_178<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、いろんな土地に行ったんだろ？
変わった料理、たくさん食べてるんだろうなあ！
あの有名な、エオルゼア三大珍味とか……？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_179<tab>House of Splendors? What kind of place is this, I wonder...
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_179<tab>ここは……なんだろ、スクリップ取引？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV09MOB1_000_180<tab>I see you're not familiar with the House. We offer wares in exchange for scrips, but our services are available only to those whom we know and trust.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_ANV09MOB1_000_180<tab>こちらは、ロウェナ商会と職人方の取引所です。
取引は、完全紹介制となっております。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_181<tab>So if I want to be a customer, I need to make a name for myself... One day, Nhagi! One day!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_181<tab>へぇ……紹介がないと取引できない場所もあるんだな。
いつか俺も……！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_185<tab>Right, this looks like as good a spot as any.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_185<tab>ふう、このあたりなら落ち着けそうだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYTEM_000_186<tab>
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYTEM_000_186<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_190<tab>I don't know about you, but that was all very new and exciting for me!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_190<tab>たくさん話を聞けたな！
俺には、すごく新鮮だったよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_191<tab>Talking to myriad people, learning the tale behind each object... It's been a great experience, and I won't soon forget it.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_191<tab>いろんな人と話して、モノに込められた物語を知る。
冒険者として最初の仕事……大事な思い出になりそうだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_192<tab>Now then, we need to decide what we want to take to the minstrel. Have you made up your mind?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_192<tab>さて……何を選ぶか、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>はもう、決めた？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q51_000_001<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q51_000_001<tab>何を買う？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A51_000_051<tab>The Ishgardian knight's ring.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A51_000_051<tab>イシュガルド由来？の指輪

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A51_000_052<tab><var 1A 02 /var>The Sultana's Seven<var 1A 01 /var> pane.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A51_000_052<tab>新生祭のガラス絵

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A51_000_053<tab>The retired adventurer's journal.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A51_000_053<tab>冒険者の紀行録

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_193<tab>I see, I see. I did consider that too, but in the end settled on something else.
...What is it? Hehe, if you don't mind, I'd like to keep it a surprise.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_193<tab>なるほど、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>はそれか。
へへ……俺は、別のを選んだよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_194<tab>Come, let's purchase our respective items, and meet back where the minstrel awaits!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_194<tab>それじゃ、それぞれ品物を買って、
詩人さんのところで合流しようか。
また後でな！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_194<tab>You obtain the Ishgardian knight's ring.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_100_194<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
「イシュガルド由来？の指輪」を手に入れた！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_200_194<tab>You obtain <var 1A 02 /var>The Sultana's Seven<var 1A 01 /var> pane.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_200_194<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
「新生祭のガラス絵」を手に入れた！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_300_194<tab>You obtain the retired adventurer's journal.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_SYSTEM_300_194<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
「冒険者の紀行録」を手に入れた！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_195<tab>Hehe, you'll find out what I chose soon enough!
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_195<tab>何を買ったかは、後のお楽しみってことで！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_200<tab>Welcome back. You've each found an item, I trust?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_200<tab>やあ、おかえり！
その顔は、何か見つけてきたんだね？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_201<tab>Well now, what have we here...?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_201<tab>なるほど、これは……？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_202<tab>A knight who set out to fight for the realm and gave his life for a stranger... Be it fact or fiction, 'tis a moving tale of valor and sacrifice.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_202<tab>ふむ、義心で駆けた騎士の、形見の指輪か……。
真偽はともかく、その話には感じるところがあるね。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_203<tab>It reminds us that, though many events may be beneath history's remembrance, they may have altered the lives of those who lived them.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_203<tab>歴史として記されるには、あまりに小さな戦いでも、
その時、人は何かを想い、行動し、物語を生み出すことがある。
当たり前だけど見失いがちな事実を、思い出せたよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_204<tab>Ah yes, <var 1A 02 /var>The Sultana's Seven<var 1A 01 /var>, I know it well. 'Tis an iconic tale of leadership amidst great adversity.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_204<tab>ふむ、このガラス絵の題材……
「女王陛下と7人のララフェル」の逸話だね。
まさしく、第七霊災における象徴的な出来事のひとつだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_205<tab>It may be said that Her Grace's actions that fateful day helped to forge Ul'dah as it is now. In that sense, it well suits the theme for my composition.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_205<tab>女王陛下の過去の行いが、現在のウルダハを形作る……。
そういう意味では、今回の詩作の試みに通じるものがあるね。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_206<tab>The journal of an adventurer, you say... Despite the vendor's claims, such records typically do not have much historical value, on account of their limited perspective and inherent partiality.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_206<tab>ふむ、各地を旅した冒険者の紀行禄か……
実は、この種の私的な記録の史料的価値は、さほど高くないんだ。
書き手が当事者で、記述が偏っている可能性があるからさ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_207<tab>Yet by the same token, they have great value to me, for they offer a glimpse into the writer's heart. There is no richer material for penning verses.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_207<tab>だからこそ、僕にとっての価値は高い。
ここには書き手が生きて、感じた想いが刻まれているのだから。
詩作にとって、これほど有益な情報はないよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_208<tab>Now then, what of you, young Nhagi?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_208<tab>さて、ナギ君は何を選んできたんだい？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_209<tab>And what might this be?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_209<tab>おや、これは……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_210<tab>It's a scrapbook of articles from <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_210<tab>グリダニアのゴシップ誌、
『週刊レイヴン』のスクラップブック。
実は、姉貴がこの雑誌の記者なんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_211<tab>You see, my sister is a reporter for the tabloid. During the Calamity, she traveled the realm, interviewing adventurers about their journeys. And I loved nothing more than to hear her tales.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_211<tab>姉貴は当時から記者として各地を飛び回り、
冒険者に旅の話を聞いたりしながら、記事を書いてた。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_212<tab>They seemed like such a diverse crowd, adventurers. No two people were alike. And yet they were united in the free, unshackled lives they lived. It struck a chord with me, and in time I found myself admiring them.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_212<tab>俺、姉貴から取材の話を聞くのが好きだったんだ。
冒険者にはいろんな人がいて、皆、自由に日々を過ごしていた。
だから自然と、俺も冒険者に……って憧れたんだろうな。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_213<tab>Looking back, it was my sister who instilled in me the desire to see the world─to become an adventurer. That's why I chose this scrapbook.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_213<tab>言ってみれば、姉貴の記事、姉貴の仕事が、俺の旅の原点なんだ。
だから……今と過去を繋ぐ第七霊災ゆかりの品として、
俺は『週刊レイヴン』を持ってきたんだよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_214<tab>I see... The footprints someone leaves on their journey become the starting point for another...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_214<tab>……なるほど、誰かの残した足跡が、
別の誰かの旅の原点となる……か。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_500<tab>Yes, a verse comes to me─a blessing for those souls who are taking their first chary steps into the unknown. Pray, lend me your ears...
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_500<tab>ひとつ、いい詩が浮かんだよ。
聴いてくれるかい、新たな旅路を歩まんとする人々へ贈る、
祝福と祈りの詩を……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_600<tab>(-???-)Greetings, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_600<tab>(-？？？？-)ようこそ、光の戦士よ……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_601<tab>
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_601<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_602<tab>(-???-)This is a world that exists outside your reality. Could it be a dream? A flight of fancy conjured by your weary mind? Perhaps...or perhaps not.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_602<tab>(-？？？？-)ここは、現し世とは異なる世界……。
目にしているものはすべて、君の夢や幻かもしれないし、
そうじゃないかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_603<tab>'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance. My name is Naoki Yoshida, and I have beckoned you here that I might express my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_603<tab>やあ、はじめまして、僕の名前は「ヨシダ・ナオキ」。
驚かせてすまない、今日は改めて君にお礼が言いたくて、
次元の狭間での邂逅を演出させてもらったんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_604<tab>'Tis a pleasure to meet you again. As I have in the past, I have beckoned you here that I might express my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_604<tab>やあ、また会えたね、僕の名前は「ヨシダ・ナオキ」。
驚かせてすまない、今日は改めて君にお礼が言いたくて、
次元の狭間での邂逅を演出させてもらったんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_605<tab>First of all, I wish to thank you for continuing to grace us with your presence. You and your fellow adventurers are our inspiration, and this shall never change.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_605<tab>……まずは、この世界で冒険を続けてくれて、ありがとう。
君たち冒険者の存在は、
いつだって僕たちの活力になっているんだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_606<tab>The world, however, is an ever-changing place, mysterious in its elusiveness.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_606<tab>世界や歴史というものは、不思議で捉えどころがなく、
絶えず変化が続いていく……

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_607<tab>Unexpected hardships may turn our lives upside down. And though we all desire peace deep in our hearts, the sparks of conflict never cease to be struck.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_607<tab>思いもしない困難が、僕たちの生活を一変させてしまったり、
誰もが平和を望んでいるはずなのに、
争いの火種は消えることがない。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_608<tab>Like an adventurer's journey, the world is constantly moving towards the unknown, and it takes considerable courage to alter course.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_608<tab>でもそれは、冒険者が歩みを進めるのと同じで、
世界も、この星も、まだ見ぬ未来へ向かって、
歩み続けていることの証拠なのかもしれないね……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_609<tab>Yet I ardently believe that it is a small-but-significant step in our quest to create new adventures.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_609<tab>世界を変えてしまうことは、いつだって怖さがつきまとう。
でもそれは、新たな冒険を生み出すための、
小さいけれど、大きな一歩だと思っている。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_610<tab>Indeed, another great change is about to visit the world, and it shall open the way to exciting new journeys.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_610<tab>この世界に、再び大きな変化が訪れようとしている……
でもそれは、心躍る冒険に続く道。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_100_610<tab>And 'tis our abiding hope that our journey together shall ever continue on, to the distant horizon and beyond.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_100_610<tab>そう、君たちと僕たちが共に歩む冒険の旅は、
どこまでだって続いていくのだから。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_611<tab>...Now, the time has come for this vision to end; time for your eyes to open from this waking dream.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_611<tab>……さて、忙しい君をあまり引き止めるものじゃないな。
この幻想も、そろそろ終いとしよう。
ひとときの夢から覚める頃合いだ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_612<tab>Return to walking your path, and know that you are in our hearts always.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_612<tab>冒険者として、英雄として、そしてひとりの人として……
これからも自らの旅路を歩み続ける君のことを、
僕たちは本当に大切に思っている。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_613<tab>Till next we meet, I bid you safe travels.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_YOSHIDANAOKI_000_613<tab>だからどうか、息災で。
そしていずれまた、どこかで……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_700<tab>Thank you for the generous reward─and the uplifting verse. It gives me courage for the road ahead.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_700<tab>詩人さん、詩と報酬を、ありがとう。
なんだか、この先も旅を続ける元気をもらえた気がする。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_701<tab>Speaking of which, it's time I set out on my own. Though it was brief, I enjoyed our time together, and I hope to see you again, somewhere out there!
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_NHAGIAJAKKYA_000_701<tab>それじゃあ、俺はもう行くよ。
短い間だったけど、あんたと話ができてよかった。
……また、どこかで！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q99_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_Q99_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A99_000_001<tab>Come what may, never forget to smile.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A99_000_001<tab>笑顔を忘れず、元気で！

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A99_000_002<tab>Pass my regards to your sister.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A99_000_002<tab>お姉さんによろしく

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A99_000_003<tab>I look forward to hearing your tales.
target: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_A99_000_003<tab>いつか、お互いの旅の話をしよう

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_702<tab>Though much and more was lost in the Calamity, intrepid souls continue to set forth, paving the way unto the future. In such a moment in history do we stand, and for you I would perform another song.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_702<tab>第七霊災では多くのものが失われたが、
旅立つ人たちは常にいて、新たな歴史を綴っていく。
そんな「今」に立つ君に、もうひとつ詩を贈らせてくれ……。

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_703<tab>Your life is a riddle, to bear gladness and grief,
'Neath stars and through storms, the answers to seek.♪
Your footprints are threads, to be gathered and woven,
A song of dawn resplendent, dancing high to the heavens.♪
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_703<tab>『あなたの人生は問い続ける　歓び　そして悲しむために
　星々の眼差しの下　嵐を進み　あなたは答えを探すだろう

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_704<tab>From the embrace of the gods though mankind has been torn,
Upon winds eternal lives and memories are borne.♪
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_704<tab>　あなたは足跡を刻み続ける　集め　そして紡ぐために
　<var 4A ((灯)) ((あかり)) /var>は言の葉　暁の歌　それは風に乗り　天高くへ舞い上がる
　あなたはいつか知るだろう　その記憶こそ　答えだと

source:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_705<tab>The future is unwritten, bring it rapture or sorrow,
Our journey shall continue, unto tomorrow and tomorrow.♪
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_705<tab>　悠久の風の中　神なき世界を歩むが人ならば
　命と命　世界の記憶　因果の裡に在る限り　
　旅路は続く　あしたへ　そしてまた　あしたへ』

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_706<tab>I wonder─how did you feel as you watched Nhagi set off? Did the sight fill you with worry for a fledgling adventurer? Or did it awaken fond memories of your own humble beginnings?
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_706<tab>……君は、新たに旅を始めた彼を見て、どう思った？
頼りないと感じただろうか、それとも心強いと感じただろうか。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_707<tab>Whichever it may be, I know that yours is a journey more trying than most. There will be times when you are overcome by loneliness, and each step feels heavier than the last. In such a moment, I bid you remember this:
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_707<tab>君の旅はきっと、人と比べて過酷だ。
時には、独りで旅をしているように感じられるかもしれない。
けれど、そんなときはどうか思い出してくれ。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_708<tab>So long as you harbor love for this world, ever shall there be a place for you in it. Your adventures will never end.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_708<tab>それでも君が、この世界を愛するかぎり、
旅が終わることはない。
冒険は、まだまだ続いていくのだと……。

source: TEXT_FESANV801_04544_000_800<tab>You have unlocked the jigsaw puzzle mini-game. To play mini-games, open the toy chest found in any inn room.
target:
TEXT_FESANV801_04544_000_800<tab>各国の宿屋の客室にある「トイボックス」から、
ミニゲームを遊ぶことができます
